title: AI Portfolio Assistant
shortDescription: An interactive terminal-based portfolio assistant powered by Groq API.
fullDescription: A unique portfolio experience that mimics a terminal interface. It uses the Groq API to power an AI assistant ('AmalOS') that can answer questions about my skills, projects, and background in a witty and tech-savvy persona. The application features a realistic typing effect, command history, and system boot sequences.

title: Modern E-commerce Platform
shortDescription: A full-featured e-commerce solution built with Laravel and React.
fullDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform designed for scalability and performance. It features a robust backend API built with Laravel and a dynamic frontend using React. Key functionalities include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, secure checkout integration, and an admin dashboard for order management.

title: Task Manager Pro
shortDescription: A collaborative task management tool for remote teams.
fullDescription: Task Manager Pro is a productivity tool designed to help remote teams collaborate effectively. It allows users to create boards, lists, and cards to track tasks. Features include real-time updates using WebSockets, file attachments, due dates, and assignment tracking.

title: Smart Weather App
shortDescription: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts.
fullDescription: A sleek weather dashboard that provides accurate weather data and forecasts based on the user's location. It utilizes the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch real-time data and displays it using interactive charts and weather icons. The app supports dark mode and multiple location saving.
